content: i needed a break from the saga writing that my patterns have developed into and went looking for a small project that would work as a gift for a friend he s a gamer and proud geek and his girl is a wonderful knitter - so i had to come up with something good inspired by evonine s tentacle bag this is a small bag that will most likely be used as a dice bag as a fan of lovecraft reh and the cthulhu mythos i couldn t resist putting my own spin on it one that ended up pretty convoluted as usual since it s become a habit to write down whatever i m knitting i thought i d type it up and share with anyone else that had a need for a little bag clutched in tentacles the possible variations are endless please post pictures now i wonder if i could scale it up into a hat muttermutter
